@ extremezone, LOL!
If I am so childish and you are not, why do you keep coming back for more? Would'nt this be beneath you? You can cease this silliness at any time by apologizing for spamming MY UPLOAD you childish idiot. Or better yet, get off of mom and dads computer and actually SHOW UP for your 6th grade education, THEN we could have a grown up discourse about what your problem is... BTW, WHAT IS YOUR PROBLEM? You keep saying that I am spamming you, however anyone with the time and inclination can CLEARLY see that YOU were the idiot who FIRST felt the need to come by my page and knock me for trying to get this film out there . Is it some sort of misplaced pride issue you have? If you release a movie on TPB before someone else does that make you feel better about having a small penis? And if so then why do you feel the need to knock someone elses efforts to release the same film? I thought TPB was about sharing (which is really caring), but apparently not for you, somehow the more you U/L the better you feel about yourself (BTW, you're NO AXXO!)... Really sad, I suppose if I were a christian I would pray for you :(

And BTW, after they SELL TPB to a "corporation" (AKA RIAA/MPAA/FBI/CIA consortium) ALL of your hard work will only insure your life sentence at Gitmo... Remember that your IP is logged EVERYTIME you U/L, I on the otherhand will find it only mildly amusing when they storm my neighbors house since I am a TRUE PIRATE who is jacking their wi-fi!!!
LOL! Thanks teachie, I will just say "would not" and "should not" from now on! Because wouldn't just dosn't look right to me! ...Err, does not look right to me!
